Simplify & ScaleReal Estate Decarbonization

Act Now






















































































Measure  Scope 1,2 & 3 emissions from asset operations

Automate data tracking from your utility bills, building management systems, and ERPs. Our platform calculates Scope 1/2/3 emissions for all 23 inventory categories as per GHG Protocol.
Uniquely designed for Real Estate, we have customized Scope 3 modules for >10 asset classes and the largest EF dataset for the industry. 













Assess & improve your building designs for   Embodied Carbon

Automate embodied carbon calculations and compare/contrast design options with Accacia’s embodied carbon module. 
We have the largest dataset of generic and EPD material emission factors, allowing you to optimize your building designs with the lowest GWP value materials.













Calculate Financed Emissions  for your investment portfolio

Calculate financed emissions for your investment portfolio and understand climate risks by asset class, geography, or investment strategy.
Our platform allows you to calculate financed emissions as per the PCAF framework while allowing the flexibility to choose between using industry average data vs actual reporting from investee companies.













 Set Net-Zero targets and plan+track your decarbonization journey

Commit to net-zero goals and use our AI to plan your decarbonization journey. Our platform also helps with estimated costs and complexity levels of projects.
Use our marketplace to buy offsets or connect with vendors suitable for your decarbonization projects.













Create Healthy,High-Performance Interiors

Prioritize occupant health and environmental responsibility with our sustainable solutions. We deliver indoor environments that meet stringent standards like LEED & WELL, ensuring optimal air quality, safety, and sustainability. We provide eco-friendly material selection to create spaces that enhance productivity and well-being.
















Ready to revolutionize your carbon reduction strategy today?

Products for the industry 
From single-asset to multi-billion dollar portfolios, and from the owners to lenders, assets managers to operators & developers – we’ve got you covered.









Assets Managers

Understand your portfolio & asset-level emissions for owned and managed assets







Operators & Facility Managers

Automate emissions tracking & decarbonization by integrating BMS & ERPs







Developers

Account for embodied carbon emissions from building materials and construction activity







Funds & Banks

Financed Emissions for debt & equity investments and risk assessment for your investment portfolio







Property Insurers

Improve your insurance underwriting process by understanding the transitional risk of your portfolio















Clients & Industry Partners





























































Accacia helped us to accurately measure and monitor our carbon emissions across our hotels. The platform’s real-time monitoring capabilities and user-friendly interface enabled us to identify emission hotspots and implement targeted reduction strategies. By following Accacia’s recommendations, we achieved significant emissions reductions and made substantial progress towards our sustainability goals. 




Somsakd Srikuruwan  Fulcrum Ventures






Accacia has surpassed our expectations with its smooth onboarding process and an innovative platform. We look forward to strengthening our relationship with Accacia to support our sustainability journey.




Maulik Jain  Harmony Lifestyles
